authored_entries.title: Adventure at Sea — A Voyager’s Perspective
authored_entries.markdown:
## Full Disclosure
I have stood watch for 0 nights aboard *Adventure of the Seas*. These reflections draw from direct experience aboard other Royal Caribbean ships and guest soundings consistent with our editorial process. Each line is reviewed and refined with the same care given to firsthand notes, presented to help smooth the waters ahead of your own sailing.

disclosure.editorial_note: I have stood watch for 0 nights aboard Adventure of the Seas. These reviews represent both firsthand accounts and aggregated guest perspectives — depth soundings taken in our shared wake, edited to the same high standards.
disclosure.review_policy: All authored notes meet In the Wake’s editorial standards for clarity, fairness, and firsthand verification where applicable.
